description: A massive Marine fortress occupying Navarone Island, commanded by Vice Admiral Jonathan. The fortress is built into a rock formation in the middle of a cape, with enclosed waters that trap ships. It serves as one of the most strategically important non-canon Marine bases in the One Piece anime.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Brought Before Jonathan
keyEvents.description: Usopp, disguised as Inspector Shepherd, is escorted to Jonathan's office within the fortress.
keyEvents.significance: The fortress becomes the stage for a battle of wits between Usopp and Jonathan.

keyEvents.title: Robin Arrives as Inspector Shepherd
keyEvents.description: Robin enters Jonathan's office disguised as the real Major Shepherd, exposing Usopp's deception.
keyEvents.significance: The fortress serves as the location where Robin's strategic deception succeeds.

keyEvents.title: Jonathan Plans His Strategy
keyEvents.description: Jonathan uses his office in the fortress to plan the systematic capture of all Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: The fortress becomes Jonathan's chess board as he orchestrates his tactics.

statusHistory.reason: Operational Marine base during G-8 Arc

description: The naval docks within the G-8 fortress where marine ships are maintained and repaired. The Going Merry is held here after falling from Skypiea into the enclosed waters of the base.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Searches the Docks
keyEvents.description: Usopp, disguised as a marine chore boy, arrives at the docks to locate the Going Merry.
keyEvents.significance: The docks become the location where Usopp attempts to rescue the crew's ship.

keyEvents.title: Mekao Discusses Going Merry's Condition
keyEvents.description: At the docks, shipwright Mekao talks to Usopp about the Going Merry's mysterious repairs and deteriorating condition.
keyEvents.significance: The docks serve as the location where critical information about the ship's fate is revealed.

keyEvents.title: Drake Questions Usopp at Docks
keyEvents.description: Drake arrives at the docks and interrogates Usopp, eventually exposing his deception.
keyEvents.significance: The docks become the location where Usopp's first disguise is compromised.

description: The prison facility within the G-8 fortress where captured pirates and criminals are held. Zoro and later Usopp are imprisoned here during the G-8 Arc.

keyEvents.title: Usopp Imprisoned with Zoro
keyEvents.description: After his deception is exposed, Usopp is thrown into the brig cell with Zoro, making him the second captured Straw Hat.
keyEvents.significance: The brig becomes the holding place for two Straw Hats and sets up their eventual escape attempt.

statusHistory.reason: Holding Straw Hat prisoners during G-8 Arc

description: The main kitchen facility of the G-8 fortress, operated by head chef Jessica. Luffy and Sanji infiltrate this location disguised as the famous Marley Brothers chefs.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Sanji Discovered in Kitchen
keyEvents.description: Jonathan discovers that the Marley Brothers are actually Luffy and Sanji in disguise, forcing them to flee.
keyEvents.significance: The kitchen becomes the location where another Straw Hat cover is blown.
